blogPost.excerpt: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
blogPost.body: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
blogPost.title: Lucky Carrot - Make your employees super engaged, recognized, & appreciated
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 幸运萝卜是一个全方位的员工参与平台。⠀◾让员工互相认可，◾为员工的成就带来可见性，◾通过调查让员工的声音被听到，◾提供洞察力，提高员工的参与度。
localize.tagline: 让你的员工超强的参与度、认可度和感激度。

localize.description: 幸運蘿蔔是一個全方位的員工參與平臺。⠀◾讓員工互相認可，◾爲員工的成就帶來可見性，◾通過調查讓員工的聲音被聽到，◾提供洞察力，提高員工的參與度。
localize.tagline: 讓你的員工超強的參與度、認可度和感激度。

previous.excerpt: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
previous.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch

localize.description: 加入我们，每周与标志性的产品领袖进行炉边聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地图产品负责人 2月11日：张佳娜，Webflow产品副总裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就职于Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 了解成功的产品发布的成败因素

localize.description: 加入我們，每週與標誌性的產品領袖進行爐邊聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地圖產品負責人 2月11日：張佳娜，Webflow產品副總裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就職於Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 瞭解成功的產品發佈的成敗因素

next.excerpt: Applysis is a data analytics tool, helping businesses owning mobile applications to analyse customer reviews efficiently, in a matter of minutes. With the help of AI we detect concrete problems and most requested features.
next.title: Applysis - Analyse mobile app reviews efficiently, in minutes.

localize.description: Applysis是一款数据分析工具，帮助拥有移动应用的企业在几分钟内高效分析客户评价。在人工智能的帮助下，我们会发现具体的问题和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内高效分析移动应用的评论。

localize.description: Applysis是一款數據分析工具，幫助擁有移動應用的企業在幾分鐘內高效分析客戶評價。在人工智能的幫助下，我們會發現具體的問題和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內高效分析移動應用的評論。
